Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne abakhayi baboolanga mbu shiwarumwa tawe, “Ewe boola; mbu; “Nyasaye ayela okhuba omuloli wanje. Hakari wanje ninanyu, nende ulia uli nende obumanyi bweshitabo.”
Alif Lam Ra. Eshitabu sheshibwa khwiwe kho orusie Abandu mushilima obayile mubulafu, khubuchami bwa Nyasaye wabu, Oboosie khunjila ya ulia Owokhushila Owitsomibungwa
Nyasaye, ulia owebili mwikulu nende khushialo bioosi nebibie yenyene, ne eshinyasio eshilulu shiliba khubakhayi
Balia bachama obulamu bwokhushialo okhushila bwo mwikulu, ne bekalilanga injila ya Nyasaye ne bayenyelanga okhukotiombokha, abo bali mubukori obwahale

Ne shikhwaruma Omurumwa yesi yesi okhuyiniakhwo khulusungo olwa Abandu baye, anyoole okhubenoosilia, kho Nyasaye alekhule owayenya okhukora akore, ne alunjisia owayenya, naye niye wa Amaani Owamachesi

Netoto khwaruma Musa nende ebimanyisio biefu (nikhumuboolela mbu ) “orusie Abandubo okhurula mushilima okhutsia mubulafu, ne obetsulisie tsinyanga tsia Nyasaye” Toto mu ako khulimwo nende ebifune khubalia befwilanga nende okhupa orio
